game.description: The village of Oakwood has been plagued by a series of strange occurrences. Livestock has gone missing, and some villagers have even reported seeing shadowy figures lurking in the forest.
game.objective: Investigate the strange happenings in Oakwood Village and put an end to whatever evil is afflicting it.
game.reward: A magical amulet that grants resistance to fear

tasks.description: Speak with the local farmer who has lost several head of cattle.
tasks.objective: Gather information about the missing livestock.

tasks.description: Explore the forest and search for any signs of dark magic.
tasks.objective: Find evidence of the source of the strange occurrences.

tasks.description: Confront and defeat the source of the darkness in Oakwood Village.
tasks.objective: Put an end to whatever evil is afflicting Oakwood.

game.title: The Shadows of Oakwood
